title: league wont launch
body: When i click launch i get a bug splat i've read on here before and tried everything. i then created another user on my computer to see if that would work and it did played a bunch of games got off went to bed then after school turn my computer on and boom bugsplat when i launch into the game. then i couldn't reconnect so i shut it down then bugsplat when i ran as admin when not running as admin i would click launch and nothing would happen pls help i just want to play league.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are usually caused by a system driver or hardware issue that causes a poor interaction with League. Our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) covers the most common solutions, so I definitely think that would be a good place to start.

Let me know if those steps helped.
I get a black screen after hitting launch.  I see the interface outline, but it's nothing but black.  Reinstalling now, hope it works.
